About the Company: Bharat Seats Ltd is in the business of manufacturing complete seating systems and interior components for the automotive and surface transport.The company also operates research & development centre which handles projects from the concept stage through modelling, designing prototyping to testing and validation for the final product. The centre has received approval from the Ministry of Science and Technology Department of Scientific and Industrial Research.Their product range includes Four wheeler seating system,Two wheeler seating system,Moulded carpets,Two wheeler frames and sheet metal components,Railway seats and berth & Two wheeler main frame
